DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety efficacy treat visually significant bilateral cataract newer technique Immediate Simultaneous Bilateral Cataract Surgery ( ISBCS ) versus conventional technique Delayed Sequential Bilateral Cataract Surgery ( DSBCS ) select patient population .
DOC.criteria: Age 30100 Candidate topical anesthesia Signed informed consent Allergies medication use study Can topical anesthesia Unwilling participate research trial Have significant ocular comorbidities Have know systemic immunocompromised state
